      Create a grid element.
      Parameters:
      x1 - grid corner 1 x
      y1 - grid corner 1 y
      x2 - grid corner 2 x
      y2 - grid corner 2 y
      x3 - grid corner 3 x
      y3 - grid corner 3 y
      x4 - grid corner 4 x
      y4 - grid corner 4 y
      z - grid height z
      color - grid tile color
